short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Write and read comments about any page on the internet!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Updates
2.0.6
* saving the url's hash.
* updated promo tiles

2.0.5
* fixed issue with thumbs up, thumbs down, and flagging

2.0.4
* added thumbs up, thumbs down, and flagging

2.0.3
* fixed misspelling in promo tile
* fixed - null querystring no longer converted into "?"

2.0.2
* replaced button text with button icons
* added footer image
* clearing input after successful submit
* increased popup width
* created new promo tiles

2.0.1
* saving the querystring of the website being commented on. Now comments are associated with the hostname, pathname, and querystring of the webpage.

2.0.0
* backend rewritten and moved from Heroku to Firebase
* frontend rewritten using material-ui components
* added screenshots
* added promo tiles
* added icons
* added permissions justification
* added privacy policy - https://url-comments.com/pages/privacy-policy
* added terms of service - https://url-comments.com/pages/terms-of-service
